Course Resources

These resources are good sources of more in-depth knowledge of the concepts and practices taught in this course. Use the resources to apply the concepts and to expand your knowledge of integrating the science practices into your adult education classroom.

 

Links to Explore

Job Accommodations Network:

  • More learning disabilities accommodation examples
    http://www.jan.wvu.edu/soar/LD/LDex.html

Employment-related anti-discrimination provisions of the Rehab Act:

  • A guide to disability rights laws: http://www.ada.gov/cguide.htm
  • An employment law guide, with a chapter on equal opportunity for individuals with disabilities: http://www.dol.gov/compliance/guide/503.htm
  • Job Accommodation Network: http://www.jan.wvu.edu/links/about.htm
  • LD-specific job accommodations information: http://askjan.org/soar/LD.html
